title: Lasith Croospulle
text: Lasith Croospulle (born 10 October 1998) is a Sri Lankan <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er. He made his <a href="Twenty20">Twenty20</a> debut for <a href="Negombo%20Cricket%20Club">Negombo Cricket Club</a> in the <a href="2017%E2%80%9318%20SLC%20Twenty20%20Tournament">2017–18 SLC Twenty20 Tournament</a> on 24 February 2018. He made his <a href="List%20A%20cricket">List A</a> debut for Negombo Cricket Club in the <a href="2017%E2%80%9318%20Premier%20Limited%20Overs%20Tournament">2017–18 Premier Limited Overs Tournament</a> on 10 March 2018. In August 2021, he was named in the SLC Greys team for the <a href="2021%20SLC%20Invitational%20T20%20League">2021 SLC Invitational T20 League</a> tournament.
